flowchart TD;
  subgraph UserGroup;
    LayerA;
    LayerB;
  end;
  subgraph AdminGroup;
    LayerC;
    LayerD;
  end;
    LayerA@{shape: circle} -->|2| LayerC@{shape: circle};
    LayerB@{shape: circle} -->|1| LayerC@{shape: circle};
    LayerA@{shape: circle} -->|2| LayerB@{shape: circle};
    LayerC@{shape: circle} -->|1| LayerD@{shape: circle};
    linkStyle 0 stroke:red,stroke-width:4px;
    linkStyle 1 stroke:red,stroke-width:4px;
